code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Modal.css";import Form from"../Form/Form";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Modal(props){const{isModalOpen,selectedNote,toggleModal,editNote}=props;const[hasCursor,setHasCursor]=useState(false);const handleCloseModal=()=>!hasCursor&&toggleModal();const handleMouseOverModal=()=>setHasCursor(true);const handleMouseOutModal=()=>setHasCursor(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal ".concat(isModalOpen?"open-modal":""),onClick:handleCloseModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-content",onMouseOver:handleMouseOverModal,onMouseOut:handleMouseOutModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{selectedNote:selectedNote,toggleModal:toggleModal,editNote:editNote,edit:true})})});}
